action.text: Amendment SA 1317 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1317 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 50. Record Vote Number: 291.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1317.
Amendment SA 1317 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S9629; text: CR S9629) To fulfill Homeland Security promises.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1317 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 50. Record Vote Number: 291.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1317 proposed by Senator Byrd.
